doc.after: Busan lies on a number of rail lines of which the most important is the Gyeongbu Line which connects it to other major cities such as Seoul Daejeon and Daegu All classes of trains run along the Gyeongbu Line including the superhigh speed KTX trains which provide frequent services to Seoul in approximately 150 minutes The Gyeongbu Line terminates at Busan Station Other lines include the Donghae Nambu Line which connects Ulsan Pohang and Gyeongju
